altername_name: Geo's Quest 2: In search of Queen Lorrain
name: Geo's Quest 2
overview: Sequel to Geo's Quest and precursor to Geo's Quest 3: Gateway to Nowhere.We join our adventurer Geo as he sleeps. Being a techy in a low tech firm, Geo's mind often wonders to forgotten lost lands. He often dreams of the same land & people every night only to awake before he discovers who and where they are. Will this finally be the night Geo's dreams are answered?
